title: Your probate application
block1Heading2: Post your documents to the Probate Registry
block1Text3: Print this coversheet and include it with your documents.
block1Text4: If you do not have a printer, write your reference number {ccdReferenceNumber} on a sheet of paper and send it with your documents.
block1Text5: If the will or codicils have changed in any way since you’ve had them, you’ll need to include a letter explaining what’s changed and why.
block1Text6: The grant of probate won’t be issued if you don’t have all the necessary documents.
block1Text7: Send your documents using a signed-for postal service to:
block1Text8:
Digital Application
Oxford District Probate Registry
Combined Court Building
St Aldates
Oxford
OX1 1LY
block1Checklist-item1-will-no-codicils: the original will (this won’t be returned to you)
block1Checklist-item1-will-codicils: the original will and any updates (codicils) (these won’t be returned to you)
block1Checklist-item2-spouse-renouncing: a renunciation form filled in by the spouse or civil partner of the deceased who is permanently giving up the right to make this application for probate
block1Checklist-item3-will-not-uploaded: the original death certificate (this will be returned to you)
block1Checklist-item4-iht205: the completed inheritance tax form IHT 205
block1Checklist-item5-spouse-renunciated: a renunciation form filled in by any executors who are permanently giving up their right to make this application for probate
block1Checklist-item6-deed-poll: copy of the deed poll document for {executorCurrentName}
block2Text1: You have posted the documents needed for your probate application.
block2Text2: You will receive another update when the Probate Registry has received your documents.
block2Text3: You do not need to do anything.
block3Text1: Your documents were received by the Probate Registry on [__DATE_HERE__]
block3Text2: Your probate application will be processed and you will receive your ‘grant of probate’ in the post. This currently takes about 8 weeks.
block3Text3: You will be contacted if there are any issues with your probate application.
sentDocuments: I have sent my documents to the Probate Registry

required.summary: You haven’t ticked the check box to let us know that you’ve sent your documents
required.message: Tick the check box to let us know that you’ve sent your documents
